document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan & Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host records.
Lymantria dispar
(summer host) (
Shenefelt 1972
;
Nixon 1973
;
Hérard et al. 1979
;
Papp 2008
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Dendrolimus pini
(winter host) (Wilkenson 1945 ;
Shenefelt 1972
;
Yu et al. 2012
), In Japan , the winter host is
D. spectabilis
(
Nixon 1973
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Dasychira abietes
( Germany ) (
Nixon 1973
).
Shenefelt ( 1972 )
reported
Liparis auriflua
,
C. pseudabietis
,
O . antiquoides
,
Lymantria monacha
,
Creatonotos albistiga
,
Sphinx pinastri, Euproctis chrysorrhoea
,
Calliteara pudibunda
,
Orgyia postica
,
Epicallia villica
,
Dendrolimus albolineatus
,
D. sibericus
,
D. punctatus , Malocosoma
neustra,
Ostrinia nubilalis
were also reported by
Shenefelt ( 1972 )
and
Yu et al. ( 2012 )
. In Europe, it was reported from
Lymantria dispar
,
Epicallia villisa
and
Dendrolimus pini
(
Fahringer 1936
;
Yu et al. 2012
). In Japan it has been reported from
Lymantria dispar
,
Dendrolimus albolineatus
,
D. spectabilis
,
Dasychira pseudapietis
and
Malacosoma neustria
(
Watanabe 1937
;
Yu et al. 2012
), in Formosa , from
Orgyia postica
(
Sonan 1932
;
Yu et al. 2012
). Other records are:
Acronicta rumicis
(
Cho et al. 2006
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Calliteara abietis
,
Clostera anastomosis
,
Eriogaster lanestris
,
Euproctis chrysorrhoea
(
Tobias 1986
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
E. taiwana
(
Chen et al. 2009
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Clostera pudibunda
(
Mazzoglio et al. 2005
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Dasychira pseudabietis
,
Dendrolimus albolineatus
,
D. pini
,
D. sibiricus
,
D. spectabilis
,
Epicallia villica
,
Malacosoma neustria
,
Orygia australis postica
,
Teia antiquiodes
(
Telenga 1955
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Dendrolimus punctatus
(
Sun and Liu 1958
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
D. superans
(
Kamijo 1982
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Ivela auripes
on
Cornus controversa
(
Togashi 1981
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Lymantria dispar
on
Quercus cerris
, Q. petraea and Q. rubra (Bouché 1834 ;
Telenga 1955
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Lymantria abfuscata
(
Sankaran 1976
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Orgyia australis
(
Sonan 1944
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
O . thyellina
(
Togashi 1981
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Ryacionia buoliana
(
Papp 1984
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Yu et al. ( 2012 )
reported the following
Acrolyta nens
,
Anastatus japonicus
,
Brachymeria secundaria
,
Cirrospilus pictus
,
Dibrachys microgastri
,
Dimmockia secunda
,
Eurytoma appendigaster
,
E. goidanichi
,
E. verticillata
,
Gelis agilis
, G. a e r a t o r ,
G. asozanus
, G. b i c o l o r ,
G. kumamotensis
,
Lysibia nana
,
Mesochorus testaceus
,
M. anomalus
,
M. gracilis
,
Mesopolobus subfumatus
,
Mokrzeckia pini
,
Monodontomerus aereus
,
M. minor
,
Ooencyrtus kuvanae
,
Pediobius crassicornis
,
P. orientalis
, P. p y rgo ,
Perilampus
sp.,
Protapanteles porthetriae
,
Psychophagus omnivorus
,
Pteromalus apantelophagus
,
P. semotus
,
Spaniopus japonicus
. In Iran , it has been reported from
Phyllonorycter populifoliella (
Žikić et al. 2014
)
.
